1-1.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
1-1.Text: Rescue your girlfriend, bring the president home, and save America!

1-2.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
1-2.Text: Reports from the air says it looks like [shake]HELL[/shake] out there!

1-2.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
1-2.Text: Act quick and show no mercy!

1-3.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
1-3.Text: Looks like the boss of this level is up ahead.

1-3.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
1-3.Text: Hold your fire until you have a clear shot.

2-1.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
2-1.Text: It's a good thing we have you on our side.

2-1.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
2-1.Text: This gap ahead looks like a pretty big jump

2-1.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
2-1.Text: Shoot a RPG at your feet and and you should be able to clear it with a [rainbow]ROCKET JUMP

2-2.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
2-2.Text: That explosive repellent skin of yours is sure one fancy party trick!

2-2.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
2-2.Text: Keep your eyes out for more of them [shake]communist[/shake] bastards.

2-3.Name: [center]Joe
2-3.Text: Nice to meet you, my names Joe. I might look like I bite, but if you look closely I don't have any teeth

2-3.Name: [center]Joe
2-3.Text: [shake]WHOA COWBOY[/shake], I see you're packing a giant grenade launcher of sorts, you got a permit for that thing?

2-3.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
2-3.Text: The only way you can clear that gap is by using Joe as a launch pad for a [rainbow]ROCKET JUMP[/rainbow]

2-4.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
2-4.Text: Looks like the only way to the next level is though that sewage pipe.

2-4.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
2-4.Text: Oh come on... a little feces never killed anyone.

3-1.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
3-1.Text: WOW it's sure dark in there... who woulda thought?

3-1.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
3-1.Text: You'll have to figure out a way to light up your surroundings

4-1.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
4-1.Text: Thought I lost you there for a second.

4-1.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
4-1.Text: You're almost at the objective, just keep movin'.

4-2.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
4-2.Text: [shake]INCOMING STAMPEDE, FIRE AS FAST AS YOU CAN AND GET UP THAT HILL

5-1.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
5-1.Text: To make this jump you will need shoot yourself in mid air

5-1.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
5-1.Text: First do a [rainbow]ROCKET JUMP[/rainbow] then aim at your feet in mid air and fire!

5-2.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
5-2.Text: You're almost at the final boss.

5-2.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
5-2.Text: There are 4 walls up ahead, you just have to berak though them and you'll be there

5-3.Name: [center]Broken 4th Wall
5-3.Text: It's just: What if mario had a rocket launcher? ...and that's the joke.

5-3.Name: [center]Broken 4th Wall
5-3.Text: There's nothing clever about asking: 'What if RPG meant rocket-propelled grenade, instead of role playing game?'

5-3.Name: [center]Broken 4th Wall
5-3.Text: I mean where's the humor there? This whole experience is just a lazy attempt in pandering

5-4.Name: [center]????
5-4.Text: Look's like you're having a tough time.

5-4.Name: [center]????
5-4.Text: Let me advance you to the platform.

5-5.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
5-5.Text: Well well well isn't this a surprise

5-5.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
5-5.Text: That's right I'm the [shake]FINAL BOSS[/shake] after all

5-5.Name: [center]Broken 4th Wall
5-5.Text: They just made you the final boss because they ran out of assets and got lazy

5-5.Name: [center]Sergeant Sarge
5-5.Text: As I was saying let's settle this once and for all!
